name: shipyard-marketplace
description: Shipyard for Claude Code — from random thought to shipped, tested product in 13 commands.

metadata.description: Shipyard — 13 slash commands covering discovery, research, wireframes, architecture, TDD build, code review, Playwright MCP browser testing, 8-agent QA loop, bug fixing, coverage review, shipping, and pipeline status. Your product's shipyard.
